Title: a typical day at work what you learned
Review Description: Good collaboration with supportive team members Good work culture Opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies Management highly encourages employees to learn and take certifications Good benefits No micromanagement Flexible working arrangements Challenging project
Pro: a typical day at work what you learned
Con: a typical day at work what you learned

Title: Good part timer colleagues but aunties a bit toxic
Review Description: Need to deal with many types of annoying customers Part timer colleagues around the same age will most likely be the only sane people around Some aunties who have been working with ntuc for over 1020 years love to say how senior they are

Title: Not bad
Review Description: good working experience Employers are good and i had wonderful colleagues manage to also celebrate different occasions and attended companys dinner and dance as an itnern

Title: Fast Paced
Review Description: Shift work can be at erratic timings and during holidays and peak period it can get very crowded and congested Additionally customers can be very rude but work is easy to pick up quickly

Title: Easy and Flexible
Review Description: Working at Fairprice as a parttime grocery shopper was a good experience simple job scope just need to pick items according to the list given Lots of walking though

Title: Easy jobs
Review Description: Was employed at the ntuc for a short period of time Abt one month Job was a little boring just restocking and checking the foods expiring date Quite chill job Nice supervisors

Title: Fast paced and efficiencycentric
Review Description: Its all about the paced you work and how fast you can clear the stocks from newly arrivals and the ones in the backstore Occasionally got told off just because was engaging with customer inquiries

Title: Rewarding but tiring
Review Description: Nid to stand for long hours pay was good but need to work for 42 hrs per wk most people are quite friendly and patient as well customers are generally quite nice

Title: Stressful environment
Review Description: I worked there for a few months postlockdown periods I was part of the online ecommerce part for NTUC and it was a hectic and stressful environment There were numerous orders a day which forced all the staff to work constantly Inventory is often not stocked due to the constant stream of orders advance orders that need to be cleared before each delivery time slot

Title: Relaxed but repetitive
Review Description: I did the same thing everyday Main job scope was to replenish and mostly did replenishing for the whole shift It is a very repetitive job so you will need to get used to it

Title: productive and fun
Review Description: it is a office hour job work with min stress less stress means aslo less return But it is all good for low stress job task can do part time study

Title: Good workplace
Review Description: Had fun working there understanding how tough the supermarket line work is but it is an essential service fast paced Physical work but with teamwork is fine

Title: Demanding job but rewarding and rather fun
Review Description: I worked as part time cashier 5 days a week 5 hours a day I enjoyed working with my colleagues to serve customers We worked as a team And often helped each other out like reminding each other or helping in various ways Overall it was a rewarding experience

Title: Great workplace and colleagues
Review Description: Typically have to restock goods and answer customers questions when available Also have to order and place stock according to planogram as well as help with other areas when peak time hits

Title: Fun working environment
Review Description: Simple Job but need to be more alert when handling cashvouchers and other terms of payment made by customers Be patient to every customer needs character especially complaints Need to face stress when it comes to festives seasons

Title: productive and fun
Review Description: i get to know friends there the supervisor there is quite friendly and will guide u patiently and whenever u ask them anything they will be glad to help u

Title: Fun and Convenient
Review Description: I went to work as a PT at Fairprice Everything was fine job wasnt stressful coworkers are friendly supervisors too until i was dismissed as they found a new permanent staff to replace me I was shocked to hear that it was my last on that day I would not reccomended others to work here for shortterm sch holidays They can just kick you whenever they want to

Title: Very nice people
Review Description: Coworkers are very friendly and wont hesitate to help you when in need although they like to gossip about others

Title: Slow paced but can be tough and tiring
Review Description: Currently working as a replenisher and it is enjoyable if working with people you get along with However their management staff can be very demanding and unhelpful so got to depend on yourself at times

Title: Great company and colleagues but tiring
Review Description: Work here as a part time staff at unity pharmacy by fairpice for 2 years during my studies now currently a full time staff My expirence here is good friendly colleagues family oriented working environment and always supportive Only downside is shift work is tiring work many days then off 1 day and the cycle begins Otherwise everything else is good

Title: Very Good Company
Review Description: It is good pay with good benefits i think it is one of the few companies with good benefits and pay that is very very very good and living for the hours

Title: Fun Working environment
Review Description: Family Orientated great culture and many opportunities to learn as individuals However career progression may be limited as there is quite competitive on promotion

Title: Friendly coworkers no work life balance
Review Description: Coworkers are friendly and helpful Taught me how to do the stuff in the beginning and very thoughtful and understanding Worked 6 days a week as a packer is tiring

Title: fun place to work at
Review Description: great environment need learn cashiering and counting own cashiering money before end work most enjoyable is to talk to friends and have lunch together help each other when in need or dealing with difficult customers

Title: Encouraging
Review Description: Dependent on manager and team you work with Fast paced and stressful with many transactions to go through Have to learn to deal with difficult customers and to address their demands

Title: Retailer with a heart for customers
Review Description: The supermarket places emphasis on customer service and prides itself as a social enterprise with the mission to moderate the cost of living Depending on the store the experience can be different

Title: Good environment
Review Description: Have different outlet nearest to our home fun environment able to meet different types of people must good in communication must be alert have different job scope weekly

Title: Very productive and enjoyable
Review Description: I really enjoyed working with NTUC Its really great experience üôÇ very productive and enjoyable The reason for leaving this Job is just I cant continue permanent night shift Love this company ‚ù§Ô∏è

Title: Stressful but good benefits
Review Description: The hours are rostered which shows their no regard to employees life outside of work Have to pay for every small cashier miscount Most team leaders are nive and friendly but ther are a lot of annoying and naggy indivualds running the store

Title: Productive n fun place to work
Review Description: It‚Äôs a easy job but stressful as the job you do never ends unless you stop n take break too many heavy things to carry not good for health but I still enjoyed the job because time flys n some colleges are very friendly

Title: more learning about customer relationship and productive sales
Review Description: learning about cust√≤mer service rekation with them about feed back what they need if possible inorder to building better service to them about their conplain inorder to improvement to our comoany system and build close relation with customer inorder ti get more support from them in coming future inorder to increase our salesmore friendly and helpfull person toward them with giving a policy face of smile

Title: good learning experience
Review Description: learned many things get to meet different people daily interaction with customer If you are active then will be ok in a fast paced environment and multitasking

Title: Productivity and fun
Review Description: U work hard and work smart Ntuc will take care of you and your payfree upgrade to higher post if u work hard and show them that u are capable and reliable enough to lead a team

Title: Good working environment
Review Description: Supportive managers good working environment nice colleagues and good remuneration which made my experience at the NTUC fairprice a good experience

Title: This is the place of your life changing place bring you to higher level
Review Description: Everyday you have something to learn and new experience in your workA very good team workif you love the job theres no harder things for youGood teams with full supportbonuses are incredible no idea üòç

Title: Stable job
Review Description: Its fun working A very big family but you must be able to work together with seniors Cause they tend to be abit grumpy Other then that i experience there is fun

Title: Ok
Review Description: Care of staff good environment The hardest part is carrying stock due most of elderly staff Have a chance to learn how to use computer n knowledge

Title: Nothing good
Review Description: Terrible management Unstructured Only good thing is the freebies from the about to be expired food OT a lot work a lot but pay is very miserable and little

Title: Challenging but Rewarding Environment
Review Description: Working in NTUC Fairprice has taught me numerous things that helped improve my current skills Management is very good and fair to each and everyone Healthy work environment with good and hardworking colleagues

Title: Productive Fun work place
Review Description: Fast stessful but get to learn more knowledge about fruits arrange the space for incoming new stocks for easier replenish where the space area is limited

Title: Tiring and unpleasant work environment
Review Description: Quite tiring because I was in nonfood department The team leader is absolutely unreasonable and impatient She blames me that I told the manager that the roster had not been released yet during my second dayby right my roster should be released on first day She scolds her department members for unreasonably and ridiculously On the other hand there is also a lazy NTUC boy who walks around use mobile phone and always talks to the merchandisers unnecessarily I had been doing most of the replenishing work and he did little He has bad temper and terrible attitude by yelling toward his colleagues and merchandisers Quite a number of temp staff left because of these two black sheep Overall it has been a disaster in NTUC Marine Parade nonfood department

Title: productive fun working place
Review Description: a good place to work Sometime difficult to handle stock during CNY Christmas because a lot of incoming stock promotions good benefits for workers in term of training
Con: no fix hours breaks for staff

Title: Suitable for people of all ages
Review Description: Working well with elderly colleagues made me become more caring of the surrounding and working equipment as safety is always important This would be a good starting point for youngsters to experience the working world and at the same time make new friends and learn life experiences from the elderly as to how one should treat the people and things around you

Title: Worst company to work with
Review Description: I need to take customer temperature and scanning of identity card under the sun I have to guide customer how to qr code download Apps help them to key in their information Too many work to do at this outlet and have to work under the sun

Title: Nil
Review Description: Management and staffs in tanglin mall are great Having alot of fun working there However with a toddler i dont have enough time to spent with my kid especially when i have to work in the afternoon shift

Title: Production issues
Review Description: Always a problem with production due to cable thefts Generator was not able to power all major machinery Staff was demotivated due to poor salary payments

Title: Productive and Fun Place
Review Description: Helpful colleagues Good work culture fast paced Dynamic retail setting Work life balance Fun culture Autonomy in decisions Sales driven

Title: Excellent
Review Description: This is a part time job It is through the agency that the job is engaged The cashiering team is very friendly and take care of each other Team work is demonstrated

Title: Experience
Review Description: It was a learning journey for me Throughout my time there I was exposed to different work ethics and the true definition of team spirit It was indeed an eye opener and a memorable experience

Title: Fast paced
Review Description: Fast paced and major management rotation annually Review of strategy and realignment required for every change in management Poor flexi benefits No flexi dollars

Title: fun work place
Review Description: nice enviroment and friendly co workers i love to work there i did night shift we have 3 dffnt shifts i mostly took night shift most secure place

Title: fun and excellent team mates
Review Description: Very nice to work and good workmates Good team leader and enjoyed by working different shifts Some days are busy Customers are nice and friendly Updating ourselves by attending various training

Title: Good working environment
Review Description: Verry good Company benefits and working Environment the best place to work Fresh food have a fod safety standards can learn more about food safety and other training

Title: Productive and fastpaced
Review Description: A fastpaced work culture with good learning and growth opportunities Management are knowledgable and good guidance are provided for new hires Most enjoyable part of the job will be the satisfaction received after a launch of a successful campaign

Title: Facilities Working Systems
Review Description: The facilities provide by the employers are very useful The working systems used by the employers really helps the employees to have some work life balance

Title: Good
Review Description: Ntuc is very good but the outlets chief cashier not happy each other and the never do thing go out and they never said give warranty letter and the outlets admiralty two months already many people resign also about two chief cashier same staff always take mc they never scolded

Title: Good respect good good difficult customers pay day
Review Description: Typical day month end I learn customer service managing apply rules always Work place was enjoyable hardest when u meet difficult customers month

Title: Fun more relaxed workplace
Review Description: Has a more open culture Employees are allowed to work at their own time and target as long as they finish their task promptly before the set timeline Colleagues are friendly and approachable willing to help one another

Title: Less time in office
Review Description: Pick up Chairman from his resident and proceed to his meeting events and functions location as per schedule Ensure arriving early and pick up on time Driving at the best comfortable mode and safe Attend to vehicle servicing and and inspection as per schedule Vehicle must be well kept clean and odour free

Title: Fun working environment
Review Description: Overall is a good place to earn some allowances good culture do not have any politics supervisors and colleagues are helpful and nice overall good experience

Title: Productive and Fun Workplace but can be quite challenging
Review Description: A good place to work as colleagues is generally quite nice due to the existing values and culture set up in the organisation However depending on which department you are in the working hours can be quite long and prone to everchanging challenges due to the scale and size of the company

Title: A Stress full job
Review Description: A good place to earn a lot more but no room to grow for foreign workers A very stress full job Difficulty in acquiring new staff Management care less about the foreign workers and favor the locals despite of their wrong doings A place where I find a lot of friends with different cultures

Title: I really enjoyed my job
Review Description: The staff were very kind and patient when it comes to teaching and would gladly help whenever help was needed It was a really great experience since it was chinese new year period with the crazy amount of people buying lots of goods for chinese new year

Title: temporary job
Review Description: Just personal view Short period at the job so not able to give comment Every job is similiar which is mutitasking of jobs very busy tight schedule for duties Need to be very hard working to deliver the task on time Academic qualification plays an important role

Title: Nice place to wrk
Review Description: Friendly placeCan enjoy Work there enjoy working there Friendly place to work college alate friendly and help fulIf we face any problem the manager and leader Al help to settle the problems

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: Some of senior staff not interested with new stuffand not willing to guidebut management staff and manager are good I cant work with people who are not friendlythat the reason i resigned

Title: Peaceful
Review Description: Usually work alone but I made friends along the way I topped up dairy products like milk cheese and yogurt etc The pay is OK but sometimes it is too tiring as you need to keep on topping up thing

Title: Saw how a supermarket is run
Review Description: This job provided me an opportunity to see the innerworkings of how a supermarket is run from preparing the supermarket for opening to its customers to shutting down the supermarket for the night while prepping it for the next day

Title: An alright workplace
Review Description: I work at one of the branches I would say that all of the people there are friendly However there was some miscommunication and misunderstandings that should not have happened in the first place due to payroll but this is also solely because of the agency I went to Overall I learnt a lot but I would not commit for that long

Title: Productive
Review Description: Well the organization is big everybody is busy including the CEO who is also an MP for SerangoonWe talk less Long day 1012 hrs Friendly Waiting expose to many intereting place such as Parliament House

Title: Great Job Experience
Review Description: A typical day at work included serving customers at the checkout counter and managing the money in your own cash drawer What I learned from the job were customer service skills which included how to manage customer queries and difficult customers Head cashiers in charge of me are great people who made me feel welcomed and valuable The hardest part of the job was the long hours and it was physically demanding to stand for long periods of time Most enjoyable part of the job was definitely interacting with the older and experienced coworkers who were all friendly and patient in guiding me to do my job well

Title: Social Enterprise with split personality
Review Description: Working level culture is cordial and friendly Politicking happens a lot at the senior management level which leads to roadblocks and slows down progressinnovation Senior management is unable to align vision and expectations in order to drive the company forward as a team Recent talent acquisition seems to have been overly focused on personnel from the banking and management consultancy sector which leaves the organisation topheavy and shortstaffed to carry out the actual work

Title: FairPrice management
Review Description: FairPrice is a very well managed and established organization in Singapore Being the largest local grown retail company it has gained acceptance in the society frequently holding social events to benefit the community working hand in hand with government and non profit organizations It has also several sponsorship programs to help the needy Staff welfare benefits are also very well received including flexi work hours medical and dental coverage etc All in all FairPrice is one of the best local organizations to work with

Title: Family working style
Review Description: A typical day at work would be monitoring projects andor meeting project managers to understand projects workplace Culture is more like family The hardest part of the job is convincing project managers to do documentation The most enjoyable part of the job is speaking to people from all works of life in the profession

Title: Company culture
Review Description: Jobs arent just a paycheck and given the amount of time spent working its important for me to make sure theres a good fit This company has good culture and I learned a lot

Title: Fun workplace
Review Description: Cashier collecting money and packing Help out in the training new Cashier on the Job Management was good Had good relation with colleagues supervisor

Title: Retail
Review Description: o Trained new cashiers on procedures customer service and sales techniques o Created attractive displays to promote items o Responded to customer requests and directed to merchandise

Title: busy
Review Description: a typical day is always busy cashiering and handle customer no comment for management good learning place would send for training long standing hour fun part is team player

Title: Working style
Review Description: Good worklife balance Company going through transition from traditional retail to digitization Trying to create an omni channel experience Hardest part of the job is about staff management

Title: working
Review Description: everyday we doing multitasking that everything we need to know how do cashiering topping up of items cut fish frozen and etc always overtime must do finish the work before going back

Title: Fun
Review Description: Handle cash Sales Smile Punctual Friendly Helpful Acknowledge Hardworking Always help Promote sales Give helping hands for pioneers Have passion for others

Title: My opinion and experiences
Review Description: The work is straight forward and simple to handle However the remuneration is very low and the working hour is long We are required to work on most public holidays without any double compensation Most of the staff are cooperative except for a few Nothing is too difficult except for some people who gets impatient when there is a sudden influx of customers in the queue for delivery services Nothing is too difficult except for some unreasonable or difficult customers who loves to complaint even for some minor issues or when they could not get a replacement or refunds These customers requires our tactfulness and soft skill to handle At all times do not offend them even though they may be nasty Just avoid any argument and quickly get a fellow colleague to assist you in handling the customer so as to appease himher However giving the best services to the customers is the most enjoyable always serves with a smile showing that you care

Title: management
Review Description: The management works hand in hand with employee of the company to ensure that employee has the benefit and company has meet with the profit benefit More involvement of employee in CSR and other programe

Title: fun place
Review Description: learn how to restocking stock and how to maintain good personal hygiene and was able to get along with some good colleage and had a good experince in working there

Title: Workplace and interactions
Review Description: I get to interact with walkin consumers all the time I learnt to serve them with a smile no matter how difficult they are to deal with I learnt to compose myself with a gentle voice and humble attitude even if they are in the wrong and serve them The typical day at work as a retailer and a cashier was to make every customer who walk into the store and leave with the impression that they are important to us so that they will come back to shop with us again This was my first job and out on the field with customers i get to learn how to serve them talk to them suggest and help them with their choices make them feel special to us to the storecompany

Title: enjoy workplace
Review Description: shift working learn how to use the credit card point card good management and about the culture is good hardest part is long queue when make a payment and is also enjoyable part

Title: a good learning experience
Review Description: a good learning experience Was often moved to different departments so had to learn from scratch within a limited time which helped improve my adaptability

Title: pleasant
Review Description: Typically a day at work involves bringing out merchandise and display them Sometimes there is delivery and I have to check the DO Occasionally I have to do housekeeping There are other duties too like wrapping the magazines

Title: secured and simple job at NTUC Fairprice Colleague at Fairprice are fun characters but not motivated because most of them are retire
Review Description: Fun working environment No career prospects Management system is worse Stuff not getting updated Can damage backside cause most the time carry the heavy items

Title: Fun workplace
Review Description: Learn something new everyday peak hours only in afternoon good company culture Everyone is fun to work with Great job benefits and jobs are easy

Title: productive company
Review Description: First thing is to thank God and love your work ived learned to interact with people follow managements rules be part of the company as a family and enjoy every single and moments the work

Title: supportive work environment
Review Description: I was personally comfortable working here Seniors and supervisors were helpful and guided me It was overall a pleasant working environment and i was able to learn new skills The job became tiring when there were overwhelming customers due to promotions or holidays but it was manageable as most customers were understanding and patient the seniors also taught me ways to work faster without getting annoyed or angry

Title: Learn a lot of things
Review Description: Clean the area of replenishing First in first out the stock before replinish I Learned how to handle staff and customers also ordering and recieving of stocks Hardest part when I forget to order the stocks Most enjoyable is to served the customers what they need

Title: Fun place to work
Review Description: I worked just below my blook Was a part timer there I packed food and do cashering The pay was to low and i wanted to study So i had to keace NTUC

Title: join only if you ran out of option
Review Description: go find other job like usher or some event better pay and more enjoyableHere your carry heavy stuff and some time you may injured yourself so join if you wanna work out and get paid at the same timeYou will need to have a flexible mind if not you might be hard on youAlso some team leader will be more biased base on if you are ite or olevel same goes to the seniorSo ya working is never a good thing but no choice need money Some senior although they are fierce but they still guild you well just that you have to get use to their gangster attitude Others you might get back stab control around and sometime split vulgar by the old seniors there in hokkien usually which i understand Team leader is OK OK as in normal attitude arrogant and strict but just that he carry customer ball too much during selling orange until they climb over his headUnlike some other company i worked they have the right to ignored customer if they gone too much

Title: Loved to work as team
Review Description: Loved to work as a cashier as I got a lot experience in this linenot only work with NTUC but used to work with 711 for more then 10years n giant for 2 yearsnot been working since last 2 yearscoz my kids are still young n need more attentionnow my kids are big enough to look after the themself

Title: Fun but can be tiring during festive period
Review Description: Overall good experience Fun but can be tiring at times Especially during festive period such as Chinese New Year Teach you the skills to handle responsibility and upset customers

Title: Good work environment
Review Description: Good place to work at Typical day at work included shelving up stock serving customers and operating the tills The job helped develop my work related skills

Title: Productive and fun place
Review Description: Refreshing at the end of work Team work is actually group of people Lenient who understand our weakness Coordinate to interact with people to share the same view Fun in work

Title: Good team work and communicationhappy work environment
Review Description: Team work and good communication is most important during work Good benefit The management is more care employee I can free warm and happy Job training provided I can improve and keep daily up

Title: Good
Review Description: Work scoped set up ice bed display for seafoodpricing tagserving customer cut fishdisplayed of packed seafood and help out other displayed or replenish of other fruitsvegetables and others

Title: Fun
Review Description: You get to work with friendly people and you get to learn the basics of customers service even though sometimes customers can be tough at times but nothing that can be settled

Title: NTUC Fairprice is a good company to work for
Review Description: Working in NTUC Fairprice is fun You get to interact with a lot of people that includes fellow colleagues and different types of customers Aside from that management is real good too Its like working with your family

Title: only partrtime job
Review Description: Handling customers performing cashier job need to be patient tolerate customers Handle difficult customers must be vigilant accuracy and cheerful

Title: organised work culture
Review Description: I was attached in this company for six months as an intern and i certainly enjoyed my experience there as i managed to be apart of every of their departments from being a cashier to storekeeping and stock counting I was also given the opportunity to become a team leader and experience what was it like to supervise and manage a team Overall it was a worthwhile experience

Title: learning with excitement
Review Description: good company to work with perfect work life balance part time as per availability and salary was descent lots of perks for employees overall it was a learning opportunity

Title: Challenging and a learning experienced which is a value added for job progression
Review Description: A typical day at NTUC as a Designer is comprised of designing and generating working drawings for approved new upcoming supermarket We will have department meeting for an overview of the ongoing projects to give ideas on how to improve working capacities to problem solves issues like on the administrative side as well as problematic technical matters Designer will also conduct project meeting with the internal and external parties for sharing of important information During the ongoing project Designer has to monitored and coordinated the work on site for smooth flowing The management will keep in touch with all the other departments involve to have a meet up once a week and the Head of Department will address some important issues or for employee bonding session Its a very accommodating and conducive working place for anyone who wants to strike a balance of work and life practice

Title: NTUC retail assistant
Review Description: I was assigned as retail assistant to earn my monthly allowance to support myself during my schooling days My jobs mainly replenish goods and assist the customer

Title: Retails packer or store
Review Description: Im Rafy Im 21 yeasr oldi have a lot of experience but retail is my best part I can work if people guide me Im realy need to workfor support my family And i work be positif

Title: Working life as a Retail Assistant
Review Description: Over the years I learned to better multitask and organise my work Our typical day at work includes forwarding and replenishing of goods before waiting for new stocks to arrive on certain days i will have to do ordering of stocks to be arrived for the next day During my spare time i will do the checking of expiry of goods Fortunately for us our outlet branch manager is okay Hence there is not much issues with the management here The working culture here emphasises on working together as a team and always helping one another The hardest part of this job is attending to difficult customers however that being said i still find the joy while doing my job as i get to interact to customers and having small conversations with them The best part of all is seeing those smiles and thank you when i go the extra mile attending to customers needs

Title: Productive
Review Description: Fun to work with the aunties at Khatib Fairprice They are welcoming Friendly and easy to work with Welfare and safety are always the priority whilst working there

Title: Repetitive job
Review Description: As a part time cashier theres nothing more to it Just repetitive scanning of items asking customers for their membership card etc It would be difficult to be a fulltimer due to long standing hours

Title: Hard working
Review Description: I have learnt hw to put the product at shelves I have learnt how to check expire date I know hw to check the items Be confident

Title: Still working fine
Review Description: Working at my part time job at NTUC as a cashier is still alright The working hours is by shift which is good The management is very friendly at the outlet I worked at The hardest part of the job probably would be to handle the long queue of customer flow We need to be quick and precise at times Settling customers doubt on products etc But it is still a good job which gets me permanent salary flow as i only able to commit weekends during schooling days

Title: fun workplace
Review Description: Its something new Good experience Get to know new people The team was helpful and friendly Got to learn how to handle situation with different people

Title: Best and fun workplace
Review Description: Best salary and also like very much my cashier work And good guideness Best high bonuses Very professional and good challenges in the work

Title: It was an interesting and new experience
Review Description: The whole experience was enriching and challenging Though it was new and demanding at first the senior workers assisted me and made me more comfortable and as time pass I became more ok with all the work load passed to me

Title: fun workplace
Review Description: interesting and fun job i got a chance to feel what its like in a grocery store its all hardwork i learnt that i should be thankful for what i have

Title: I have experience more thing and new things but the salary is not enough
Review Description: I have experience new things in this company and I have learned more from it but the only problem is that the salary is not reasonable to my needs

Title: Good start
Review Description: I pretty enjoy working there as colleagues there are all friendly not even so I have a friendly boss who do not give up on me when i was about to fall Till then I finally finished my 2 months there as a temporary staffs

Title: stylish and clean workplace
Review Description: When i was working at Fair Price on the Mothers day holiday I was so excited to see womens happy because there were lower prices for materials for them

Title: challengingfun
Review Description: Working for fair price is a challenging job as productivitycustomer handling and good communication skills need to be applied as its good for the growth of the company and customer satisfactiontherefore hard work needs to be put while working for fair price Its fun working with people who give you the ability to wake up and put you in the mood for work

Title: Enjoy working with many people and happy to help elderly customers
Review Description: when you handle difficult fussy customers you have to identified their feeling either unhappy or sad shopping experieced management very understanding the problems facing by all cashiers at the counter Coworkers all are supportive and team work Hardest part are when get scolded by customers because of promotion items wrong price or customers get rotten fruits spoil items The most enjoyable part is when you get friendlygood customer
Con: short breaks working hour till midnight

Title: dangger workplace
Review Description: I learn a lot of thing at this working place like SAP system Ordering stock control I am happy I got at good teachermanager team leader to teach me But at this working place no enough staff to operate

Title: Okay
Review Description: A typical day would be quiet during day and crowded during night especially weekends and public holiday Learned a lot of stuff but mostly about retail Stock ordering is the hardest sometime it sell fast because there is an offer sometime it just stuck in your backstore seeing those stock being sold i feel some sense of achievement Co worker are friendly mostly older than me able to talk about stuff that i have no idea some in the past some in other industry and some slice of life For hardest part of the work before i promoted to retail supervisor i thought that it was ordering but after i was promoted i found out that coordinating and arrange stock is the hardest such as every thursday advertise special and weekly fairoffermustbuypurchase with purchase and sometime new stock that have been launched we have to arrange into normal shelf without breaking the previous arrangement grouping The enjoyable part of the job would be seeing customer able to get what they want to buy and happily head off to the counter for example few occasion when customer asked me location of the items they want and i was able to show it to them and they thanked me and head off to the counter some even came from faraway just to get the stuff of course nice versa if after i showed customer the product location and its out of stock i would feel a bit remorse especially if i was in charge of the lane that the product was

Title: good
Review Description: Good benefits great team members excellent company I enjoy working here and am currently looking for new challendges

Title: part time job work in weekend
Review Description: Parttime retail assistant in NonFood department which mostly work in weekend the objective is to enhance my social experience and also to earn some pocket money

Title: Work
Review Description: I learn how to handle customer and now in savills I learn how to manage residence enquiry in this MA line I seen many type of people and their view on each of them

Title: Fun and interesting workplace
Review Description: I learnt to be more detailed and attentive to the demands of the customers The management was easy to talk to easy to relate to and I can go to the supervisors anytime I feel uncomfortable I also learnt to be patient and understanding the coworkers are easy to get along with and the camaraderie between coworkers supervisors and managers

Title: Confortable with friendly colleagues around
Review Description: Ive learnt how to manage customers wants needs Even handle their complains over a product Communication among the Chief Cashiers is down with the staffs too CoWorkers are friendly and always make my day And the most enjoyable part of the job is to see my customers smilelaugh with the service provided

Title: Overall Culture
Review Description: The best part about working in FairPrice is the kind of family feeling that u will get when u work there Everyone treats each other like a family member and it is very enjoyable working in this company despite its low pay and long hours at time depending on the season

Title: Place where I learn a lot about working life
Review Description: The typical day at work start with quality checking all the goods displayed in the store and remove any goods which has gone bad or look bad Then replenish the goods if those displayed is depleting very quickly Soon we will get ready for the arrival of the stocks And this is where team work will happen my coworkers and I will move the stocks together because they are really heavy and we will be assigned to replenish different goods to speed things up Basically team work is key and also being able to attend to customers queries Some times customers would not be able to find certain products and they will ask any staff they see So even though the product is not under your section you need to be able to know where exactly it is placed to help customer Thus I also learn that we should be fully aware of our working environment The hardest part of this job is definitely unloading the goods because each box of apples are of multiple kgs and we do not have proper equipment which can help unload the goods easier And hence most of the time we might end up hurting ourselves Most enjoyable part of the job is being to work with a group of people who are passionate of their job and is willing to take care of you and teach you their great wealth of knowledge

Title: Allows me to identify and recommend what needs to be done
Review Description: The management structure has too many layers Meaning that if anything needs to be done then there is many layer of approval that need to be gotten before the project can move forward Work life balance is not that great as many times work was required to be done on off days and also outside working hours The good thing is that in my role I can identify areas that need improvements and recommend corrective actions in the form of training programs that can be conducted Though not all the programs are approved I can work around them to arrive at alternative solutions

Title: Fair treatment to all staff from management
Review Description: Enjoying work and continuous learning on my daily duties I have improved further my skills in training and multi tasking Management has been very fair with their employees regardless of their race and religion My colleagues are supportive and have respect with one another Language barrier is my greatest challenge since I dont know how speak mandarin I always feel very happy seeing my staff climbing up the corporate ladder

Title: they are selling everythings
Review Description: i have been worked in fair price singapore as a cashierso i got a lot of experience about central cash and big amount of money exchange voucher gift voucher refund voucher cash machine and how to use credit machine offline machine how to sell to the mobile card

Title: Create and maintain a loyal customer base
Review Description: Over 6 years‚Äô extensive Salesman experience within diverse retail settings‚Ä¢ Adept at operating cash register Busy functions ok good week days lunch time

Title: Happy and Fun Workplace
Review Description: Life is short and just worked in a place full of happiness will do

Title: Fastpace environment
Review Description: For a typical day of work I will be preparing quotations for major customers or coordinating with warehouse representatives or purchasers for bulk discountsFrom time to time I also handle escalated customer issues Minimal coworkers with friendly deposition politics is terrible in the company Hardest part of my job will be managing difficult customers Most enjoyable part of the job is that is it everchallenging and fast pace There is rarely a moment for resting

Title: fun with the collegue
Review Description: everybody in NTUC Fairprice are very friendly fun to work with because they are aunties that are very energetic and very concern towards each other

Title: Best Place to work
Review Description: A typical day at work is very challengingeveryday is considered as a new day where surprises arise and you need to adopt everything that is happening from customer compliments to their complaints and questionsI learned to supervise and manage a store being manned by staff of different nationalityVarying in culturebeliefs and attitudes even agesThe management is supportive in providing training and educating its staff in order to upgrade in terms of efficiency towards work and have a positive mind setMy coworkers and I practices teamwork for us to attain our common goal for the store and as often as needed we practice professionalism and respect regardless of racesThe hardest part of my job is when you need to cope up with the manpower shortages and you need to help all the staff on their day to day activityWhen you need to reach out beyond your duty in order to make things done as needed and when it is needed The most enjoyable part of my job is the learning that this kind of work has brought me that made me improve as an employeeleader and as a person
